title: Film Room SQL views overhaul: audit, fix data scope, add 16 new analytical views
description: Audit all 35+ Film Room SQL views for IPL data scope clarity (2023+ vs all-time), create dual-set views, and add 16 new analytical views covering: batter entry point analysis, match context enrichment, over-by-over bowler breakdown, batting order flexibility, new batter vulnerability, partnership analysis, dot ball pressure, boundary dependency, wicket clusters, team phase scoring, required rate performance, left-right matchups, venue batting profiles, and bowling change impact.

florentino_gate.reason: Directly improves paid artifact - Film Room is core analytical feature
